Reviews.Title: They lie
Reviews.Author: Federico Aineseder
Reviews.Content: Be careful, the camera is WB200. WB250 is lie, and when I contacted they said me "yes, the camera is wb200"

Reviews.Title: Do not buy !!!
Reviews.Author: VYACHESLAV B.
Reviews.Content: Same situation, on the picture is WB250F but they sent WB200F without FullHD function. And WB200F without FullHD, you could purchase much cheaper from other sellers. Also case for camera is not same size and is not usable for it at all (absolutely different fm picture).

ProductInfo.Features:
Capture Detailed Images in Low Light situations with a 14PM BSI CMOS Sensor
Share your Best Photos Instantly with Family and Friends with Built-in Wi-Fi
18x Optical Zoom
3.0 TFT LCD Screen
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung WB250F/WB200F Smart Digital Camera 14.2 MP 18x Optical Zoom Wi-Fi, Cobalt Black + 16GB SDHC Class 10 Memory Card + Carrying Case + Extra SL-B10A Battery + Mini Tripod Kit + USB SDHC Reader + Memory Wallet
